3D_OBJECT_DESCRIPTION: a water tank filled with water and an empty cup
GOAL_DESCRIPTION: transport as more as possible water into the cup from the tank
3D_CONFIGURATION:
self.tank = self.scene.add_entity(morph=gs.morphs.Mesh(filename='tank.obj', pos=(0.4, 0.2, 0.07), euler=(90, 0, 0)))
self.cup = self.scene.add_entity(morph=gs.morphs.Mesh(filename='cup.obj', pos=(0.3, -0.2, 0.001), euler=(90, 0, 0)))
